Name: Percentage of Request Payment that are not dismissed
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' does not happen

Name: Number of Request Payment
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities

Name: Percentage of Request Payment out of all Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Request Payment that are preceded by Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: Percentage of Request Payment from all Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of Request Payment with amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of Request Payment by STAFF MEMBER
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Number of Request Payment grouped by case:BudgetNumber
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities

Name: Percentage of Request Payment by worker
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Request Payment followed by Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of Request Payment in relation to Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of Request Payment
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Number of times Request Payment is performed
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities

Name: Percentage of Request Payment done after Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average number of Request Payment
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Request Payment'

Name: Percentage of Request Payment with an increment
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Average number of Request Payment that are followed by Payment Handled
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Request Payment' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total Request Payment done by SYSTEM
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities == 'SYSTEM' where ma is the last value of org:resource

Name: Fraction of Request Payment that are dismissed
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total Request Payment performed by SYSTEM
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities == 'SYSTEM' where ma is the last value of org:resource

Name: Ratio of Request Payment over Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Occasions how often the Request Payment is performed
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities

Name: The ratio of Request Payment that are not eventually performed
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases where 'Payment Handled' does not happen

Name: Percentage of variants containing Request Payment that also contain Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Request Payment in variants without Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Percentage of Request Payment occurring after Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Request Payment in variants where Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER appears earlier
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Ratio of Request Payment frequency between variants with and without Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Request Payment that occur in domestic travel expense claims
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Number of Request Payment for pre-paid travel costs
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities > 0 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of Request Payment where budget owner and supervisor are different persons
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Number of Request Payment requiring director approval
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities == 'DIRECTOR' where ma is the last value of org:role

Name: Percentage of Request Payment for costs actually paid versus reimbursement claims
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Number of Request Payment made per year
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities

Name: Average number of Request Payment in a month
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Request Payment'

Name: Frequency of Request Payment within two months after trip completion
